Localeresource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Catalog.CustomerProductPrice.Hint
Localeresource.Value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use customer product prices. It can significantly improve performance when disable.

LocaleResource.Name: Account.TwoFactorAuth.FirstLine
LocaleResource.Value: 1. Add our store to authenticator application

LocaleResource.Name: Account.TwoFactorAuth.FourthLine
LocaleResource.Value: Verify that our store has been added correctly in application by entering the 6 digit code generated by your application.

LocaleResource.Name: Account.TwoFactorAuth.SecondLine
LocaleResource.Value: Open authenticator application and add our store by scanning the QR Code.

LocaleResource.Name: Account.TwoFactorAuth.ThirdLine
LocaleResource.Value: 2. Enter the 6 digit code that authenticator application generates

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.CustomerUser.TwoFactorAuthenticationEnabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check this box if you want to have two factor authentication enabled in your store.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.SeoFriendlyUrlsForLanguagesEnabled.Note
LocaleResource.Value: NOTE: If you want to use SEO friendly URLs with multiple languages prefixes, don't forget to restart application to apply changes.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.SeoCharConversion.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Provide the characters which should be converted when Convert non-western chars setting is enabled. Example: ą:a;ę:e;ó:o;ć:c;ł:l;ś:s;ź:z;ż:z

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.SeoCharConversion.Note
LocaleResource.Value: NOTE: If you want to use SEO Char Conversion, don't forget to restart application to apply changes.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Orders.Shipments.ShipmentNotes.Fields.Download.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check this box if you want to add download to this shipment note.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Orders.Shipments.ShipmentNotes.Fields.DisplayToCustomer.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Mark this box if you want to display this note to customer on public store.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Promotions.Campaigns.Fields.Language.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose a language which subscribers will get this email.
